mapper.insert: insert into st_audit_his( register_number, audit_person, audit_date, audit_result, turn_down_reason, turn_down_note, status_cd ) values ( #{registerNumber}, #{auditPerson}, #{acceptDate}, #{auditResult}, #{turnDownReason}, #{turnDownNote}, #{statusCd} )
mapper.select: select audit_id, register_number, audit_person, audit_date, audit_result, turn_down_reason, turn_down_note, status_cd from st_audit_his where register_number =#{registerNumber}
